⇩⇩ 𝗠𝗶𝗻𝘁 𝗟𝗶𝗻𝗸 ⇩⇩
http://bit.ly/3X9g3vQ https://twitter.com/comm_dd/status/1620892254276816896

community @ dd: 𝗦𝗲𝗮𝘀𝗼𝗻 𝟮: 𝗕𝗮𝗱𝗴𝗲𝘀
For over 8 months, the Community Team has worked hard behind the scenes, on a range of server architecture initiatives. One of which, is the adoption of a badge system that will allow us to layer on top of our existing NFT and token requirements. https://t.co/RMytSbdweH

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Re Responsibilities migrating to Stewards are:
1) Review, Feedback and triage of Governance proposals
2) Define the DAOs Seasonal (Quarterly) focus on OKRS
3) Signers of the Treasury
Read more here https://developerdao.gitbook.io/operating-system/article-4-governance/section-3-stewards
